AYUD-R.BK.long_name: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited
AYUD-R.BK.summary: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Non-life Insurance Business and Investment Business. Its non-life insurance products include motor, fire, and marine and transportation insurance products, as well as miscellaneous insurance products, such as property, liability, engineering, and personal protection, including personal and group accident, domestic and international travel, cancer, micro insurance, burglary, money, machinery and erection, construction, workman compensation, electronics and computers, public liability, all risks, credit card, plate glass, and contractors' plant and machinery insurance products. The company was formerly known as Sri Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited in April 2019. Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Pathumwan, Thailand.

AYUD.BK.long_name: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited

BKI.BK.summary: Bangkok Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It provides fire, marine and transportation, motor, travel accident, personal accident, residential and commercial property, health, property, third party liability, business all risks, engineering, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BUI.BK.long_name: Bangkok Union Insurance Public Company Limited
BUI.BK.summary: Bangkok Union Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company underwrites fire, marine and transportation, motor, and miscellaneous insurance products. It is also involved in the rental of office space. The company was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHARAN-R.BK.summary: Charan Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transport, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. It also provides motor, compulsory, marine cargo, SME risks, property, engineering, and other insurance products. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHARAN.BK.summary: Charan Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. MTI-R.BK.long_name: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
MTI-R.BK.summary: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products and services in Thailand. The company offers motor insurance; and non-motor products that include property, marine and transportation, engineering, personal accident and health, special products, liability, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as travel and commercial insurance products. It also invests in various securities, as well as engages in reinsurance business. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTI.BK.long_name: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
MTI.BK.summary: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products and services in Thailand. It also invests in various securities, as well as engages in reinsurance business. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NKI-R.BK.long_name: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited
NKI-R.BK.summary: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was formerly known as Luang Lee Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited in 1985. The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NKI.BK.long_name: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited
NKI.BK.summary: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was formerly known as Luang Lee Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited in 1985. The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NSI.BK.long_name: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited
NSI.BK.summary: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Motor Insurance and Others Insurance. The company offers fire insurance; motor insurance comprising compulsory and voluntary insurance; marine and transportation insurance that provides coverage for losses and damages to hull and the transported cargo; and miscellaneous insurance products covering burglary, public-liability, contract-work, golfer's indemnity, etc. It is also involved in the reinsurance business; and investing in financial instruments, including bonds and others. The company operates 26 sub-branches in Bangkok. Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMK-R.BK.short_name: SYN MUN KONG INSURANCE PUBLIC C
SMK-R.BK.long_name: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited
SMK-R.BK.summary: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 178 branches. Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIP-R.BK.summary: Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers residential and general fire insurance products; marine insurance products; compulsory and voluntary motor insurance products; and personal, property, and third-party insurance products. It is also involved in investment activities. Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIP.BK.summary: Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. TSI-R.BK.long_name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited
TSI-R.BK.summary: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It offers fire, property risk, marine and transportation, motor cargo, and engineering insurance, as well as miscellaneous insurance products. The company also provides car, accident, travel, and home and condo insurance products. It serves to individual and corporate customers. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVI-R.BK.summary: Thaivivat Insurance Public Company Limited engages in non-life insurance business in Thailand. The company's insurance products include fire, marine and transportation, motor, and personal and travel accident, health, compensation indemnity, critical illness, contractor all risks, burglary, health, and global travel. It also provides reinsurance products. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
